snippet: Wade scored 28 points, including two free throws with 1.5 seconds left to lead host Miami past the Oklahoma City Thunder, 97-95, in a game that featured 38 lead changes.
abstract: Miami Heat defeats Oklahoma City Thunder, 97-95; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Wade scored 28 points, including two free throws with 1.5 seconds left to lead host Miami past the Oklahoma City Thunder, 97-95, in a game that featured 38 lead changes.

headline.main: Dwyane Wade Leads Heat to a Win
headline.print_headline: Wade Leads Heat to a Win
